keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 20, 2021 regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330).
The email was sent to Allison Stoddart, who appears to be involved in or monitoring the legal proceedings.
The case reference is United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating ongoing federal prosecution.
